definitions.definition: a supplementary procedure in the bris following the milah (excision of the akroposthion ) where the preputial epithelium of the foreskin is separated from the glans of the penis as a precursor to posthetomy .

main_definition: ( Rabbinic Judaism ) a supplementary procedure in the bris following the milah (excision of the akroposthion ) where the preputial epithelium of the foreskin is separated from the glans of the penis as a precursor to posthetomy .
